DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate inter-ethnic similarity pharmacodynamics Japanese Caucasian healthy adult male subject compare electrophysiological reaction administer E2014 extensor digitorum brevis muscle ( EDB ) .
DOC.brief_title: An Electrophysiological Study Of E2014 In Healthy Adult Male Japanese And Caucasian Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Participants age 20 44 year time obtain informed consent . 2 . Participants whose M wave amplitude potential ( baseline negative peak ) EDB stimulate peroneal nerve foot joint 1 mV electrophysiological examination time screen immediately administration . 3 . Participants judge eligible study entry investigator subinvestigator screen immediately pretreatment medical examination . 4 . Participants give full explanation objective detail study start screen give write consent base free . 1 . Participants complication history peripheral neuropathy , nerve root impairment , muscle disease . 2 . Participants disease may influence study drug evaluation , disorder gastrointestinal tract , liver , respiratory , endocrine , hematological , neurological , psychiatric cardiovascular system , congenital abnormality metabolism . 3 . Participants accessory deep peroneal nerve . 4 . Participants previously receive treatment botulinum toxin . 5 . Participants history hypersensitivity component E2014 ( human serum albumin , succinate buffer solution ) . 6 . Participants positive urine drug screening time screen immediately study drug administration . 7 . Participants receive prescription drug ( ) within 1 month study drug administration . 8 . Participants treat another investigational drug within 4 month study drug administration . 9 . Participants experience heavy exercise hard labor within 2 week study drug administration . 10 . Participants underwent blood transfusion within 3 month , whose 400 mL whole blood collect within 3 month , whose 200 mL whole blood collect within 1 month study drug administration . 11 . Participants positive hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBs antigen ) , hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) antibody , serologic test syphilis ( STS ) . 12 . Participants receive diagnosis acquire immunodeficiency syndrome ( AIDS ) positive result human immunodeficiency virus . 13 . Participants unwilling unable abide requirement study , may violate prohibition restriction study . 14 . Participants judge ineligible study entry principal investigator subinvestigator .
